General.Name: Guangxi Wuzhou Zhongheng Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangxi Wuzhou Zhongheng Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells pharmaceuticals in China. The company offers xueshuantong for injection, zhonghua dieda pills, fuyanjing capsules, jieshitong tablets, yanjianning tablets, angong niuhuang pills, shedan chuanbei liquid, and fluorescein sodium injection covers range of therapeutic areas, such as cardiovascular and cerebrovascular, neurology, endocrinology, orthopedics, ophthalmology, gynecology, pediatrics, respiratory, urinary system, and other fields. It also provides toothpaste, mouthwash, mouth spray, laundry detergents, laundry beads, shower gels, Shampoos, electric toothbrush, tooth rinser, electric toothpaste, and other series of products under the Tianqi, Tianqi Doll, and Pure Cotton Era brands; and medical instruments, including mask series, protective clothing, isolation eye masks, and forehead thermometers, as well as Chinese herbal medicines. In addition, the company produces health food products under the DOUBLE MONEY brand. Additionally, it engages in the real estate development and management, and project investment. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Wuzhou, China.

3.Name: Mr. Ding Chang  Cui
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
